education.thesis: Multilingual Natural Language Processing in Low-Resource Setting
education.summary: My PhD work focuses on borrowing labelled data from one or more languages to overcome the issue of annotated data sparsity in low-resource languages, particularly for Named Entity Recognition and Machine Translation tasks.

education.thesis: Learning from Positive and Unlabeled Examples
education.summary: Explored the use of Pairwise Ranking based Logistic Regression to solve classification problems where only positive and unlabeled examples are available, with mixed results on different datasets.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
